mapper.insert: insert into rule (id, easy_min, easy_max, medium_min, medium_max, hard_min, hard_max, easy_increase, medium_increase, hard_increase) values (#{id}, #{easy_min}, #{easy_max}, #{medium_min}, #{medium_max}, #{hard_min}, #{hard_max}, #{easy_increase}, #{medium_increase}, #{hard_increase})
mapper.select: select id, easy_min, easy_max, medium_min, medium_max, hard_min, hard_max, easy_increase, medium_increase, hard_increase from rule where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update rule set easy_min = #{easy_min}, easy_max = #{easy_max}, medium_min = #{medium_min}, medium_max = #{medium_max}, hard_min = #{hard_min}, hard_max = #{hard_max}, easy_increase = #{easy_increase}, medium_increase = #{medium_increase}, hard_increase = #{hard_increase} where id = #{id}
